routes.sectionDescription: Review the routes you have already created and open one to see its full assignment details.
routes.empty: No routes created yet. Create a new route to start planning deliveries.

addRoute.subtitle: Register a new delivery route to organize assignments and dispatch planning.
addRoute.noDeliveriesSelected: Select deliveries from the list below to add them to this route.
addRoute.selectedCount: Deliveries added to this route: {{ count }}

map.title: Delivery map
map.description: Visualize the selected delivery points directly on Google Maps.
map.noDeliveries: Select deliveries to display their locations on the map.
map.missingKey: Map preview unavailable. Configure the Google Maps API key to visualize routes.
map.loadError: We couldn't load Google Maps. Try reloading the page.

unassigned.sectionDescription: Review pending deliveries and assign them to your logistics team to keep orders moving.
unassigned.title: Deliveries awaiting assignment
unassigned.subtitle: Assign these deliveries to your couriers or update their status to keep the supply chain on track.
unassigned.empty: All deliveries are assigned. Great job!

routeDetail.notFound: We couldn't find the selected route.
routeDetail.error: We couldn't load the route details.

summary.title: Route overview
summary.description: Check the essential information about this route assignment.

map.title: Route map
map.description: Visualize the warehouse origin and each delivery point in the assigned order.
map.missingKey: Map preview unavailable. Configure the Google Maps API key to see the full route.
map.empty: No deliveries assigned to this route yet.
map.missingWarehouseLocation: We couldn't determine the warehouse location. The route line may be incomplete.
map.missingLocations: We couldn't resolve the delivery locations. The map only shows available points.
map.partialLocations: Some deliveries are missing location data, so the route line may be incomplete.
map.unableToBuildPath: We couldn't build the route path. Try reloading the page.

deliveries.title: Deliveries in this route
deliveries.empty: There are no deliveries assigned to this route.

loadProducts.title: Bulk Load Products
loadProducts.description: Upload a CSV file to import multiple products at once. Make sure the file has the correct format and structure.

exampleFile.title: Need an example?
exampleFile.description: Download a sample CSV file with the correct format to help you structure your data.

dropZone.text: Drag and drop the CSV file here to upload it, or click to select the file.

errors.invalidFileType: The file must be a CSV file
errors.fileTooLarge: The file is too large. Maximum size is 10MB
errors.uploadFailed: Error uploading file. Please try again
errors.serverError: The server returned an error. Please try again later.
errors.networkError: Unable to reach the server. Check your connection and try again.

success.uploadComplete: File uploaded successfully. Products are being imported.
